title: Start New Electric Service
description: A customer is moving into a new apartment and needs to start electric service in their name.

tasks.description: Verify the service address and check if any previous balance is due at that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the address is serviceable and has no outstanding balance.

tasks.description: Collect customer information and create a new account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new customer account in the system.

tasks.description: Schedule a service start date and explain the initial deposit requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the service activation and clearly communicates any required deposit.
